title: True Detective Season 1: Slate's Spoiler Special
description:
Slate's Willa Paskin, David Haglund, Jessica Winter and Forrest Wickman discuss Season 1 of HBO's True Detective. WARNING: This podcast is meant to be heard AFTER you've seen the show.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
